channel.title: AdonisJs on Code Chauffeur
channel.description: Recent content in AdonisJs on Code Chauffeur

item.title: How to Add Custom Validation Rules to Adonis Validator
item.description: If you are reading this article, I assume you must have used AdonisJs or you must have heard about the framework. AdonisJs is a NodeJs web framework that was inspired by Laravel. The framework was modeled after Laravel. Like most robust frameworks, AdonisJs comes with a validator module that helps you in validating data (usually user input). However, the default validator does not come with every possible rule, you sometimes have to implement your own.
